description: This source file defines the root layout and app component for a Remix-run React application, importing necessary components and styles, and setting up the document structure for the app.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Returns an array of link objects for preconnecting to Google Fonts and including a stylesheet for custom font.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that provides the overall HTML structure, including meta tags, stylesheet links, and slots for child components.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main application component rendering the Outlet for nested routes.
